name: FUN! - Time capsule - Thing of creativity
description:
This is My time capsule and a way to get to the FUN!



Follow this link to original file or continue my capsule.

https://www.figma.com/file/goWVsnJGLRsCiKSYV61pEl/?node-id=0%3A1



My story to this file:

At the Figma-Config 2021 > In the chat > Via a link > I clicked it > I saved it and it was there in the background for later. 

I went trough the pile of links and there it was - There this was.

Together with 98 other Figma friends online, this grew amazingly fast. I started participating and this, this is where i stopped.


This is my time stamp.

You have 2 options here:
  • With your friends - Download this file and invite
  • With Community  - Follow the link above.

When you are done, you publish!
Keep the link to the original file in your file. That way we can continue to grow this.

All the best
Phiip
